Class Token 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----Token
public class Token
extends Object
Token class. There aer several types of tokens, which are indicated by the value of the tokenClass variable.
  • TokenClass.RESERVED (0)
  • TokenClass.IDENTIFIER (1)
  • TokenClass.NUMBER (2)
  • TokenClass.SYMBOL (3)
  • TokenClass.NEWLINE (10)
  • TokenClass.ENDOFTEXT (11)

    More will probably be added. Check TokenClass.java for complete information.

    Author:
    Ethan Georgi

    What is the class of this token?
    getTokenValue()
    What is the value of this token?

    What is the class of this token?

    display 
     public void display()
    Display the token. Ick. tokenValue or tokenClass? or both? I'll go with something like (tokenClass, tokenValue)
